history.content:
Want to get involved with the Data Science Education Program? Want to get some teaching and course development experience? The Data Science Education Program will be offering two decals this fall. For more information on the decals and other opportunities, check out our website and the below information. 

Modules Decal: Modules integrate data science methods and Jupyter notebooks into existing courses across Berkeley, giving students the opportunity to work hands-on with data relevant to their course and receive instruction on the principles of data analysis, statistics and computing. Applications close 8/20.

Connector Associates Decal: Support the development of Berkeley's diverse range of Data Science Connector Courses and get experience working with Berkeley faculty by helping to create labs and providing guidance to students in the classroom. Applications close 8/20.
history.subject: Decals: teaching data science
